ai-tika-s0404t12:2_1: Udāyī there are three senior monks who Udāyī had made Bhaddā Kāḷī how did Venerable Udāyī say, “Forget about it.”
ai-tika-s0404t12:2_2: Being quietened: Craving for as long as the defilement of craving, etc., that is to say, dying -
ai-tika-s0404t12:2_3: For if he embraces a hindrance by the hindrances have the hindrances,
ai-tika-s0404t12:2_4: this is the name of the absorption.
ai-tika-s0404t12:2_5: For the abandoning of the hindrances, that is to say, “Entering the sense of rising away” .
ai-tika-s0404t12:2_6: The one wavering, the merchant’s work, gladness, etc., ascended the merchant’s wife of the earth, was simultaneously.
ai-tika-s0404t12:2_7: These are called the abandoning of the conceit “his is abandoned” in the way beginning, “What is including the mind taken away as stated .
ai-tika-s0404t12:2_9: It’s when a mendicant has given up the conceit ‘I am’, cut it off at the root, made it like a palm stump, obliterated it, so it’s unable to arise in the future.”
ai-tika-s0404t12:3_0: The conclusion of the skin is finished.
ai-tika-s0404t12:4_0: Thus there is the plantains on the Uttarakuru
ai-tika-s0404t12:5_0: The Book of the Nines is finished in the nine orifices.
ai-tika-s0404t12:6_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-s0404t12:7_0: if it is the upper limb.
